ygData.subject: Re: Runed Totem Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, thx for the help for getting me a runed totem staff.  Actually I m already saving money for that, just that meanwhile cant afford to pay it yet.  If
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, thx for the help for getting me a runed totem staff. Actually I'm
already saving money for that, just that meanwhile cant afford to pay it
yet. If anyone come across pple selling this staffs below 25pp, pls give
for me. I wil pay back ASAP ;)

Btw, is woven armor good? How is the AC and wt compare to clothes? Any
special features? I heard abt some swampy area quite easy to get netted
armors which can be sold at fairly good price. Can a group of 2-3 lvl
10-12 go that place?

Also, oh senior wiz, pls grant me knowledge abt binding. If I'm in a
group, and we come to a town, who shld I target on in order to bind ALL
group members to the town (or do I have to target one by one and cast
bind?). Say later we went to desert cave entrance as a group and I wanna
bind ONLY myself at the entrance (anyway out town I can only bind myself
and not the group right?), targetting myself and cast bind will only bind
myself or will affect the rest of the members? Or, do I have to quit from
group, bind myself there then re-join group? Any tips for binding myself
near hunting ground - so that I dun have to run so far if I die, hehe.

Ziltus

On Wednesday, June 16, 1999 5:18 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
wrote:

for

level

be
> prepared to pay a few gold for them. They are almost same stats as the
great
> staff, but magical and nosave. I will try to get you the staff, and i
think
> should be easier cos its pending lore and no one would want to get stuck
> with them. bbc is Bone bladed claymore. Its quite sucky actually,
-agility i
> think. Only good thing bout it its its damage cos its a 2hander.
